answers.author: Jessica Roth
answers.text:
Our city (Suwanee, GA) does 360 evaluations for both the City Manager and the management team.  We use a tool that was developed by the Carl Vinson Institute of Government at the Univ. of GA - Gov360.  Our CM has had two 360 evaluations now with that tool and each DH has had one.  It has been well received by our Council, as well as the employees doing it and receiving it.

answers.text:
Jeff, I would highly encourage you to reach out to my former city manager in Fort Collins, CO - Darin Atteberry. I've since moved to Illinois, but I would consider him to be a leading proponet of 360 evaluations and both he and the Council used them frequently during their 6-month evaluations. You can easily find his contact info using Who's Who, or I can help you as well.

author: Jeff Calentine
text: Anyone have any good information in regards to City Administrator 360 evaluations? Our situation is that City Council has asked for Department Heads to perform a 360 evaluation on the CA, and this information will be utilized by Council in the CA's next performance review. Any information in regards to this would be appreciated Thanks!!
